content: quote: Originally posted by spanner69: I wish I could find the stand alone video of this but I cant. But around the 38 second mark. Blowhard Beck starts saying that The Navy was looking to the FBI for advise about how to deal with the Pirates. Then later on he claims the Marines were needed in the standoff. "http://www.dailykostv.com/w/001151/" And he says "And the Navy doesnt know how to fix this one" While Beck may not like it that The President, Dec of Def and the naval commander on the scene didn't brief him on what was going on. Bottomline is The President and the SEALs GOT IT RIGHT! By the way if this was Olberman, Maddow or Moore claiming "The Navy DOESNT KNOW how to fix thsi one" What would the reaction on the board would be? Anyway, congrats to the NAVY!!! Well done! And Beck....Go Cheney yourself...ChickenHawk a-hole. Nice cut up job the "Dailykook" did in that video. If you saw the entire clips (the statements came from more than one, cherry picked nd cut to make him look bad) you would see that Beck was actually asking for the type of response that we ultimatly got. He was complaining about the fact that we had US Navy vessels on the scene and we are now to "PC" of a country to use force to remedy the situation. He was simply making fun of the fact that we have all of the resources of the US Navy available against a life boat and the Navy couldn't figure out how to "fix this one", he was being facetious. And his actual quote about the Marines was "We have become so politically correct that no one would even dare think about sending in the Marines to fight pirates." Next time, try not to take your "news" from a weblog that pulls ten second clips from a five minute segment just to make a commentator look bad.
